pkgmetadata.longdescription: # optimixAbstract function optimisation.## InstallEnter```bashpip install optimix```from the command-line.## Running the testsEnter```pythonpython -c "import optimix; optimix.test()"```## Authors* [Danilo Horta](https://github.com/horta)## LicenseThis project is licensed under the [MIT License](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/limix/optimix/master/LICENSE.md).
